description: Detects an executable, which is not an internet browser, making DNS request to legit popular websites, which were seen to be used as dead drop resolvers in previous attacks.
author: Sorina Ionescu
X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: One might need to exclude other internet browsers found in it's network or other applications like ones mentioned above from Microsoft Defender.
name: Potential Dead Drop Resolvers
query: (((winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true" AND destination.domain:(*.cloudflare.com OR *.githubusercontent.com OR *4shared.com OR *anonfiles.com OR *cdn.discordapp.com OR *ddns.net OR *discord.com\/api\/webhooks\/ OR *docs.google.com OR *drive.google.com OR *dropbox.com OR *dropmefiles.com OR *facebook.com OR *feeds.rapidfeeds.com OR *fotolog.com OR *ghostbin.co\/ OR *gist.githubusercontent.com OR *hastebin.com OR *imgur.com OR *livejournal.com OR *mediafire.com OR *mega.nz OR *onedrive.com OR *paste.ee OR *pastebin.com OR *pastebin.pl OR *pastetext.net OR *privatlab.com OR *privatlab.net OR *raw.githubusercontent.com OR *reddit.com OR *send.exploit.in OR *sendspace.com OR *steamcommunity.com OR *storage.googleapis.com OR *t.me OR *technet.microsoft.com OR *temp.sh OR *transfer.sh OR *twitter.com OR *ufile.io OR *vimeo.com OR *wetransfer.com OR *youtube.com)) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe")) OR (((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe") OR (process.executable.text:("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe")))) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") AND process.executable.text:("*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\msedgewebview2.exe"))) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\safari.exe") OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\brave.exe" AND process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\BraveSoftware\\*")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Maxthon\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\maxthon.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Opera\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\opera.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\SeaMonkey\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\SeaMonkey\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\seamonkey.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Vivaldi\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\vivaldi.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Naver\\Naver\ Whale\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Naver\\Naver\ Whale\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\whale.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\Tor\ Browser\\*") OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Waterfox\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Waterfox\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\Waterfox.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\midori\-ng\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\Midori\ Next\ Generation.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\SlimBrowser\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\SlimBrowser\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\slimbrowser.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Flock\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\Flock.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Phoebe\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\Phoebe.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Falkon\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Falkon\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\falkon.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\QtWeb\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\QtWeb\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\QtWeb.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Avant\ Browser\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\Avant\ Browser\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\avant.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\WindowsApps\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\WindowsApps\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*WhatsApp.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Telegram\ Desktop\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\Telegram.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\OneDrive.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Dropbox\\Client\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\\Dropbox\\Client\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*\\Dropbox.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\MEGAsync\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*MEGAsync.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Google\\Drive\ File\ Stream\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Google\\Drive\ File\ Stream\\*") AND process.executable.text:"*GoogleDriveFS.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Discord\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\Discord.exe"))))) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:("*\\MsMpEng.exe" OR "*\\MsSense.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\PRTG\ Probe.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\Engine.exe"))))
